sentences.sContent: If you furbish up these old chairs you'll have a better chance of selling them.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you furbish up these old chairs you'll have a better chance of selling them.
sentences.sCn: 你要是把这些旧椅子擦亮，就会更好卖些。

remMethod.val: fur (毛皮) ＋bish (看作brush) → 把毛皮刷亮 → 擦亮

trans.tranOther: to make bright by polishing; burnish
